actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer H.R. 6948, "A bill for the relief of Robert H. Carleton;" to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims pursuant to sections 1492 and 2509 of title 28, United States Code.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 6948, for the relief of Robert H. Carleton, to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims, pursuant to sections 1492 and 2509 of title 28, United States Code.

titles.title: A resolution to refer H.R. 6948, "A bill for the relief of Robert H. Carleton;" to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims pursuant to sections 1492 and 2509 of title 28, United States Code.
